participant_1.name: Eli Cohen
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and disciplined, Eli values his upbringing and adheres strictly to his beliefs.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year.

participant_2.name: Jasmine Lee
participant_2.personality: Rebellious but introspective, Jasmine often reflects on her choices and seeks a way out.
participant_2.background: i feel old. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i'll be released in about a month. i am here for shoplifting.
